pages.text: Tomlinsonus is a marrellomorph that walked on stilted legs from the Ordovician period. It had spines on its body that each had little spines along them, making it look like feathers. They had a head shield with 2 curved horns and segmented bodies similar to other arthropods.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
